doublet_triplet_problem.description: Triplet must be heavy (proton decay), doublet must be light (EW scale)

conclusion.phase_cancellation_at_GUT: NOT achieved in any standard GUT model
conclusion.reason: Doublet-triplet splitting breaks equal amplitude condition
conclusion.holographic_resolution: ρ = M_P² H₀² doesn't require GUT-scale cancellation

key_insight: QCD phase cancellation is SPATIAL (at geometric center with equal amplitudes). GUT phase structure is ALGEBRAIC (in broken gauge group). These are fundamentally different mechanisms.
